name: Camel Caravan and the Shoothing Stars
name_original: Camel Caravan and the Shoothing Stars
description:
This game is an endless runner with unique artstyle and a rage game flavour to it.

Go through the desert and make wishes while stars are falling. But be careful: the desert contains its dangers. The higher your score, the harder game gets! You will be rewarded for your highscore with unlockable arts.

This game is a submission to the Desert Bus for Hope 2021 game jam.
